value.query:

select sum(v) from
                  (
                    select '62,00' as v from dual
                    union
                    select '66,00' as v from dual
                    union
                    select '56,00' as v from dual
                    union
                    select '62,000' as v from dual
                    union
                    select '61,00' as v from dual
                  ) as a

                    select '61,00' as v from dual
                    union
                    select '66,00' as v from dual
                    union
                    select '57,00' as v from dual
                    union
                    select '61,000' as v from dual
                    union
